title: i am starting to hate this game
body: i went from bronze v to bronze iv and that took forever and then finally got 100lp i play my 3 games win two completely carried the one and it moves me to bronze 3 and it says I'm still in 6 and now i have a little like red thing below my ranked score why is this

replies.body:
still in 6 _what?_
It sounds like you are trying to play ranked while too new for it to be advisable, i suggest you just play normal draft and learn more about the game. Ranked can be very stressful and lower bronze is full of incredibly annoying and bad players (i just watched a friend play in low bronze last night, and was utterly shocked by the stuff people on both teams did).
The red thing sounds like a ranked badge. You get that after 25 wins, based on whether you played mostly solo, dynamic, or full team games.
What are you talking about? You are bronze 3 with 0 LP, which is perfectly correct if you just won series. What seems to be the problem?
